Reviews.Title: “Avoid if you want easy access to Rome city centre”

Reviews.Content: stayed coach tour mistake booking 2 extra nights hotel fine comfy beds size bathroom ok shower broke friday night fixed saturday morning nice residential centre rome catch bus tram costs 1 euro waited 15 minutes bus sunday 30 min piazza del popolo catching taxi day cost 14 euro day public transport strike buses real food available hotel night offer microwave meals closest restaurant 20 min walk hill bad luck sunday night walk option steakhouse 10 min road real pain day sightseeing rome needless nights stayed city centre dinner stay inconvenient travel city centre day stay closer easy yourself
